attributes.action: Get out ou the EEC and reintroduce trading with the commonwealth,scrap the human rights bill and give us back home rule on how we live in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up being dictated to by politically correct beaurcrats of the European Community.Its now time I feel to get out of Europe and determine our own future and also to get rid of the stupid human bill of rights.
